summary.para: Adds the ability to do the same as lock(...) { } but for async Tasks and awaits
This lock uses the safer semaphore to prevent any chance of a deadlock

member.name: F:Dna.AsyncLock.SelfLock
member.summary: A semaphore to lock the semaphore list

member.name: F:Dna.AsyncLock.Semaphores
member.summary: A list of all semaphore locks (one per key)

member.name: M:Dna.AsyncLock.LockResultAsync``1(System.String,System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``0}},System.Int32)
member.summary: Awaits for any outstanding tasks to complete that are accessing the same key then runs the given task, returning it's value
member.param: The task to perform inside of the semaphore lock
If this is the first call, sets the maximum number of tasks that can access this task before it waiting
member.returns: Returns the result of the task

member.name: M:Dna.AsyncLock.LockAsync(System.String,System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task},System.Int32)
member.summary: Awaits for any outstanding tasks to complete that are accessing the same key then runs the given task
member.param: The task to perform inside of the semaphore lock
If this is the first call, sets the maximum number of tasks that can access this task before it waiting

member.name: M:Dna.AsyncLock.LockAsync(System.String,System.Action,System.Int32)
member.summary: Awaits for any outstanding tasks to complete that are accessing the same key then runs the given action
member.param: The task to perform inside of the semaphore lock
If this is the first call, sets the maximum number of tasks that can access this task before it waiting

member.name: M:Dna.AsyncLock.LockResultAsync``1(System.String,System.Func{``0},System.Int32)
member.summary: Awaits for any outstanding tasks to complete that are accessing the same key then runs the given task, returning it's value

summary.para: The local path to the file useful for general viewing or details about where the file is.
This may be a virtual path on systems like iOS and Android, and full file paths on desktop systems.

summary.para: Provides a thread-safe mechanism for starting and stopping the execution of an task that can only have one instance of itself running regardless of the amount of times start/stop is called and from what thread.
Supports cancellation requests via the and the given task will be provided with a cancellation token to monitor for when it should "stop"

member.name: F:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.mWorkerFinishedEvent
member.summary: A flag indicating if the worker task is still running

member.name: F:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.mCancellationToken
member.summary: The token used to cancel any ongoing work in order to shutdown

member.name: P:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.LockingKey
member.summary: A unique ID for locking the starting and stopping calls of this class

member.name: P:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.WorkerName
member.summary: The name that identifies this worker (used in unhandled exception logs to report source of an issue)

member.name: P:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.Stopping
member.summary: Indicates if the service is shutting down and should finish what it's doing and save any important information/progress

member.name: P:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.IsRunning
member.summary: Indicates if the main worker task is running

member.name: M:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: M:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.StartAsync
member.summary: Starts the given task running if it is not already running

member.name: M:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.StopAsync
member.summary: Requests that the given task should stop running, and awaits for it to finish
member.returns: Returns once the worker task has returned

member.name: M:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.RunWorkerTaskNoAwait
member.summary: Runs the worker task and sets the IsRunning to false once complete
member.returns: Returns once the worker task has completed

member.name: M:Dna.SingleTaskWorker.WorkerTaskAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: The task that will be run by this worker
